returns._0: True if collateral is added successfully

addCollateralToken(address,uint256).details: Set decimal to 0 to remove token from whitelist

addLocker(address,uint256).details: Only owner can call this. The isCandidate is also set to false.

returns._0: True if the candidate is added successfully

burn(bytes,uint256).details: Burn teleBTC and also get the locker's fee

params._amount: Amount of the teleBTC which is minted, including the locker's fee

returns._0: uint The amount of burnt teleBTC

buySlashedCollateralOfLocker(address,uin.details: Users buy the slashed collateral using TeleBTC with discount      The paid TeleBTC will be burnt to keep the system safe      If all the needed TeleBTC is collected and burnt,      the rest of slashed collateral is sent back to locker

params._collateralAmount: Amount of collateral that someone intends to buy with discount

isLockerActive(address).details: We check a locker status in below cases:      1. Minting TeleBTC      2. Removing locker's collateral      3. Removing locker

params._lockerTargetAddress: Address of locker on the target chain

returns._0: True if the locker is active

liquidateLocker(address,uint256).details: Anyone can liquidate Locker with health factor under      100% by providing a sufficient amount of TeleBTC.

params._collateralAmount: Amount of collateral that someone wants to buy with discount

mint(bytes,address,uint256).details: Mint teleBTC for an account and the locker fee as well

params._amount: Amount of the teleBTC which is minted, including the locker's fee
params._receiver: Address of the receiver of the minted teleBTCs

returns._0: uint The amount of teleBTC minted for the receiver

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseLocker().details: Only functions with whenPaused modifier can be called

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns._0: True if collateral is removed successfully

removeLockerByOwner(address).details: Owner need to pay net minted TeleBTC to the contract

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestActivation().details: Users can only mint TeleBTC by active locker      Note: lockerInactivationTimestamp = 0 means that the Locker is active

requestInactivation().details: This would inactivate Locker after INACTIVATION_DELAY. The impact of inactivation is:      1. No one can mint TeleBTC by the Locker      2. Locker can be removed      3. Locker can withdraw unused collateral

requestToBecomeLocker(bytes,address,uint.details: This request may be approved by the owner

params._candidateLockingScript: Locking script of the Locker. Users can use this script to lock BTC.
params._lockerRescueScript: Rescue script of Locker. In the case of liqudation, BTC is sent to this script.
params._lockerRescueType: Type of Locker's rescue script (e.g. P2SH)

revokeRequest().details: Send back TST and collateral to the candidate

returns._0: True if the candidate is removed successfully

setCollateralRatio(uint256).details: This ratio is used to calculate the maximum mintable TeleBTC by a Locker

setLockerCollateralToken(address,address.details: This ratio is used as a helper to calculate the maximum mintable TeleBTC by a Locker

setLockerPercentageFee(uint256).details: This fee is taken by Locker for every minting or burning

setLockerReliabilityFactor(address,uint2.details: This ratio is used as a helper to calculate the maximum mintable TeleBTC by a Locker

setPriceOracle(address).details: This oracle is used to get the price of token in BTC

setPriceWithDiscountRatio(uint256).details: This ratio gives discount to users who participate in Locker liquidation

setRewardDistributor(address).details: This contract distributes locker fee between locker and stakers

slashIdleLocker(address,uint256,address,.details: Only burn router can call this. Locker is slashed since he doesn't provide burn proof      before the request deadline. User who made the burn request will receive the slashed bond.

params._amount: Amount of TeleBTC that is slashed from Locker
params._recipient: Address of user who receives the slashed collateral
params._rewardAmount: Amount of TeleBTC that slasher receives
params._slasher: Address of slasher who receives reward

returns._0: True if the locker is slashed successfully

slashThiefLocker(address,uint256,address.details: Only burn router can call. Locker is slashed because he moved BTC from      Locker's Bitcoin address without any corresponding burn req.      The slashed bond will be sold with discount.

params._slasher: Address of slasher who receives reward

returns._0: True if the locker is slashed successfully

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unPauseLocker().details: Only functions with whenNotPaused modifier can be called

addBurner(address).notice: Give an account access to burn

addCollateral(address,uint256).notice: Increase collateral of the lockerNo need to pass _addingCollateralTokenAmount if collateral token is native token

addCollateralToken(address,uint256).notice: Whitelist new collateral token with decimal

addLocker(address,uint256).notice: Approve the candidate request to become Locker

addMinter(address).notice: Give an account access to mint

buySlashedCollateralOfLocker(address,uin.notice: Sell slashed collateral of a Locker

getLockerHealthFactor(address).notice: Return the health factor of locker

removeBurner(address).notice: Remove an account's access to burn

removeLockerByOwner(address).notice: Remove Locker from system and send back Locker TST and collateral.

removeMinter(address).notice: Remove an account's access to mint

setMinRequiredTSTLockedAmount(uint256).notice: Update the required TST bond to become Locker

slashIdleLocker(address,uint256,address,.notice: Slash Locker for unprocessed unwrap request

slashThiefLocker(address,uint256,address.notice: Slash Locker for stealing users BTC
